nodes.documentation:
@dev Calculates Interest for staker for their stake.
     * Formula:
EarnedInterest = MAX[TotalStaked x GlobalYield - (StakeBuyinRate + WithdrawnToDate), 0]
     * @param _staker                     Staker's address
     * @return The amount of tokens credit for the staker.
nodes.name: calculateInterest

nodes.documentation:
@dev Calculates and updates new accrued amount per token since last update.
     * Formula:
GlobalYield = GlobalYield(P) + newlyGeneratedInterest/GlobalTotalStake.
     * @param _interestGenerated  Interest token earned since last update.
nodes.name: updateGlobalYieldPerToken
getStatsData

calculateInterest(address).details: Calculates Interest for staker for their stake.     * Formula: EarnedInterest = MAX[TotalStaked x GlobalYield - (StakeBuyinRate + WithdrawnToDate), 0]
calculateInterest(address).return: The amount of tokens credit for the staker.

params._stakingPeriod: valid staking time after staking starts
params._totalRewardToBeDistributed: total amount to be distributed as reward

getStatsData(address).return: Total staked.Total reward to be distributed.estimated reward for user at end of staking period if no one stakes from current time.Unlocked reward based on elapsed time.Accrued reward for user till now.

stake(uint256).details: Allows a staker to deposit Tokens. Notice that `approve` is needed to be executed before the execution of this method.

params._amount: The amount of tokens to stake
